page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: LOCAL BUSES. In Summer, four buses from Whitby pass our School each morning, calling at Robin Hoods Bay shelter, Fylingthorpe Stores and Fylingthorpe Old School on their way to Scarborough. Another bus runs as far as Fylingthorpe and returns to Whitby. In the afternoon there are five more buses. Altogether 20 buses go past our School. If you miss a bus you will have to wait over two hours for another. In Winter there are fewer buses from Scarborough and Whitby. You can catch a bus from Scarborough to Malton and York and from Whitby to Guisborough and Middlesbrough. All the public transport in Fylingdales and for miles around is owned by the United Bus Company.
